fullplot: God, heaven, and several Old Testament stories, including the Creation and Noah's Ark, are described supposedly using the perspective of rural, black Americans.
plot: God, heaven, and several Old Testament stories, including the Creation and Noah's Ark, are described supposedly using the perspective of rural, black Americans.
title: The Green Pastures
writers: Roark Bradford (suggested by: Southern Sketches "Ol' Man Adam and His Chillun'")
